mood: Your mind is racing with intellectual breakthroughs, requiring you to choose integrity over impulse.
positives: ◦ Conversations lead to solid agreements or contracts
◦ Relief from moving forward on long-standing decisions
cautions: ◦ Misunderstandings if you lack patience in communication
◦ Sharp or reactive speech caused by mental pressure
Vastu/Feng Shui/Lal Kitab Remedies: Keep a green leaf in your left pocket to facilitate decisive action and end stagnation
detailedPrediction: Jupiter (Guru) highlights communication and promises today. You may feel torn between two ideas, but the Libra Moon assists in arriving at balanced conclusions. Use this energy to formalize business agreements and build professional trust through ethical conduct. General Advice: Mean what you say. Avoid presenting radical ideas today as the timing for being understood is not yet ideal.
